title: Tesla under investigation by NHTSA for two more crashes that may have involved Autopilot or FSD
description: According to data obtained from NHTSA by CNBC, the agency is looking into at least 41 crashes involving Tesla vehicles where automated features were involved.

title: Tesla, GM, Ford questioned by U.S. senator about Chinese supply chains and connections to forced labor
description: Senator Wyden wants automakers to account for their ties to a region in China where the U.S. is concerned about the use of forced labor.

title: Google tells employees more of them will be at risk for low performance ratings next year
description: Google has released new details of its performance system overhaul internally, and it shows employees will more easily fall into lower-rated categories.

title: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried to be released on $250 million bail
Tesla shares slide nearly 9% on demand concerns, Elon Musk's Twitter distraction
description: Tesla shares slid over 9.5% at session lows as investors digested expanded discount offerings and further distractions from CEO Elon Musk's Twitter acquisition.

title: Millionaire says 90% of your success boils down to this skill—and 'young people are terrible at it'
description: Steve Adcock, a self-made millionaire who retired early at 35, shares the single most important skill you need to be rich and successful in life.

title: You really should mask up again, says infectious disease expert: The tripledemic is hitting 'too fast and too furious'
description: Don't rule out masking again just yet, says infectious disease expert. Wearing masks could give you more protection this winter during the tripledemic.

title: New head of United Airlines pilot union resigns after online comments spark outcry
description: United Airlines Capt. Neil Swindells was narrowly elected earlier this week.

title: Bankman-Fried execs likely to be freed on bail after FTX fraud pleas
description: Sam Bankman-Fried's senior executives Caroline Ellison and Gary Wang cut a deal with prosecutors for $250,000 bail in return for guilty pleas in FTX's collapse.

title: Turkey hikes minimum wage by 55% as inflation and living cost crisis bite
description: There is a political angle, country analysts say: Turkey's general election is due to be held in June 2023.

title: Demand for rural homes in Britain drops as pandemic effect fades, report says
description: In the Lake District national park area, demand for properties dipped 5% in 2022, while in Wales enquiries fell 10%.

title: 'There's no place like home': Ukraine's refugees face their first Christmas away
description: For Maryna, and the millions of others who have fled Russia's invasion this year, the holiday season is proving especially hard.

title: Gold at $4,000? Analysts share their 2023 outlook as inflation, recession fears linger
description: Juerg Kiener, managing director and CIO of Swiss Asia Capital, said investors would look to gold with inflation remaining high in many parts of the world.

title: FTX's Gary Wang, Alameda's Caroline Ellison plead guilty to federal charges, cooperating with prosecutors
description: Ellison, 28, and Wang, 29, become the second and third individuals to be charged in connection with FTX's multibillion-dollar collapse

title: China's economy looks different than it was going into the pandemic
description: The Chinese economy of 2023 almost definitely won't look like the Chinese economy of 2019.

title: A map shows the most popular Christmas dishes around the world
description: A traditional Christmas meal may be tamales, cabbage rolls or prawns, depending on where you live.

title: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried will fly to New York after days of courtroom chaos
description: Disgraced FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried is aboard a federal plane en route to New York, after a day of courtroom chaos in the Bahamas over his extradition.
